author: Xbox
description:
World Update XIX delivers the South American countries of Brazil, Guyana, Suriname, and French Guiana to the Microsoft Flight Simulator world in vibrant detail. Explore this diverse region with new Points of Interest, Discovery Flights, Landing Challenges, Bush Trips, and more.

title: Microsoft Flight Simulator: World Update XIX - Brazil Launch
